name: Ten years of AGDQ
description:
-> What's this game?
  • This game was created for the Game's made Quick 4. 
-> What this game is all about?

  • Ten years of AGDQ, that's a lot of speedruns and a lot of games. A LOT of GAMES. So the concept of this game is you must avoid the game's picture for as long as you can! (there is more than 600 pictures !)

-> Important notice:
  • There is a lot of picture, A LOT, so its totally normal that this game is 197 MB 
  • Fun fact, using a python script to find a picture of all this game on Google Image, and to save it after GIVE FUNNY RESULT, so some picture don't make any sense.
  • The video (and the music) is on GDQ's website (The AGDQ's Video and music)
  • I forgot to put it in the game but anyway, when you die, its ESC to restart.
